TEXT.TITLE: ALLEGIS'<AEG>WESTIN SETS NEWS CONFERENCE ON SALE
TEXT.BODY: Westin Hotels and Resorts, a subsidiary of Allegis Corp, said it will hold a press conference on October 21 near San Francisco to discuss the pending sale of the 61-hotel chain by Allegis. Allegis has said that it plans to sell Westin buyt has not announced that a deal has been set. Reuter
